actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that property used predominantly in dairy farming will not be eligible for the investment tax credit during years in which there is a Federal program of price supports or paid diversion for the dairy industry.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disallow an investment tax credit for property used predominantly in dairy farming during years in which there is a Federal program of price supports or paid diversion for the dairy industry.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that property used predominantly in dairy farming will not be eligible for the investment tax credit during years in which there is a Federal program of price supports or paid diversion for the dairy industry.
